虌字的基本解释

虌
biē
蕨的幼叶，即“蕨菜”。

虌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［biē］
［《廣韻》并列切，入薛，並。］
蕨菜。生于山野间，嫩叶可食。

虌字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　虌； 康熙笔画：31； 页码：页1072第58
【唐韻】幷列切，音鼈。【爾雅·釋草】蕨，虌。【註】蕨初生無葉可食，今江西謂之虌。

虌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
虌字的起名意思

暂无。

虌
Basic explanation of words
虌
biē
The young leaves of fern, that is, "fern".
虌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［biē］
["Guangyun" cut side by side, enter Xue, merge. ]
Bracken. Born in the mountains, young leaves are edible.
虌
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Jian Zi] 　虌; Kangxi Strokes: 31; Page Number: Page 1072 Page 58
[Tang Yun] Cut in a row, with a soft-shelled turtle. 【Erya·Shucao】Fern, 虌. [Note] Fern is born with no leaves to eat, and it is known as the hen in Jiangxi today.
